tool_description: ShortAdLink - Earn money on shorten links. Make short links and earn the biggest money
name: ShortAdLink - Shorten URLs and Earn Money
title: ShortAdLink - Shorten URLs and Earn Money
tool_name: ShortAdLink - Shorten URLs and Earn Money

api_list.name: Shorten URL
api_list.description: Primary method for shortening URL with custom alias.

required_parameters.name: api
required_parameters.description: You can get your API key by registering on [ShortAdLink](https://shortad.link/)

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: Enter your long URL link that you want to shorten.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description:
Default response is in **JSON** format. No need to type anything.
You can also get response in text format. Just type **text** in format field.

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
Default advertisement type is banner.
Formats available:

> **Default**: Banner (No need to type anything)
> **0**: No advertisement
> **1**: Interstitial advertisement

optional_parameters.name: alias
optional_parameters.description:
You can set custom name for your shortened URL.
Alias **min.** length: 4
Alias **max** length: 12
